mapper.sql: ID, ACCOUNT_ID, TRADE_TYPE, TRADE_AMOUNT, CHANGE_AMOUNT1, CHANGE_AMOUNT2, TRADE_TITLE, TRADE_DETAIL, TRADE_TIME, ORDER_ID, ORDER_DETAIL_ID, TRADE_VOUCHER_NO, OP_ID, MAC, IP
mapper.insert: insert into AFC_TRADE (ID, ACCOUNT_ID, TRADE_TYPE, TRADE_AMOUNT, CHANGE_AMOUNT1, CHANGE_AMOUNT2, TRADE_TITLE, TRADE_DETAIL, TRADE_TIME, ORDER_ID, ORDER_DETAIL_ID, TRADE_VOUCHER_NO, OP_ID, MAC, IP) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tradeType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{tradeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{changeAmount1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{changeAmount2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tradeTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeVoucherNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update AFC_TRADE
ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
TRADE_TYPE = #{tradeType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
TRADE_AMOUNT = #{tradeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHANGE_AMOUNT1 = #{changeAmount1,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHANGE_AMOUNT2 = #{changeAmount2,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TRADE_TITLE = #{tradeTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRADE_DETAIL = #{tradeDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRADE_TIME = #{tradeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_DETAIL_ID = #{orderDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRADE_VOUCHER_NO = #{tradeVoucherNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OP_ID = #{opId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
MAC = #{mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IP = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update AFC_TRADE set ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, TRADE_TYPE = #{tradeType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, TRADE_AMOUNT = #{tradeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHANGE_AMOUNT1 = #{changeAmount1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHANGE_AMOUNT2 = #{changeAmount2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TRADE_TITLE = #{tradeTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRADE_DETAIL = #{tradeDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRADE_TIME = #{tradeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_DETAIL_ID = #{orderDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRADE_VOUCHER_NO = #{tradeVoucherNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OP_ID = #{opId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, MAC = #{mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IP = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ID, ACCOUNT_ID, TRADE_TYPE, TRADE_AMOUNT, CHANGE_AMOUNT1, CHANGE_AMOUNT2, TRADE_TITLE, TRADE_DETAIL, TRADE_TIME, ORDER_ID, ORDER_DETAIL_ID, TRADE_VOUCHER_NO, OP_ID, MAC, IP from AFC_TRADE

select ID, TRADE_TITLE, IFNULL(IFNULL(CHANGE_AMOUNT1, (TRADE_AMOUNT-CHANGE_AMOUNT1)), 0.00) AS TRADE_AMOUNT, TRADE_TIME from AFC_TRADE
and ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and TRADE_TYPE in (11, 20, 51, 54, 60, 61)

select ID, TRADE_TITLE, IFNULL(TRADE_AMOUNT, 0.00) AS TRADE_AMOUNT, TRADE_TIME from AFC_TRADE
and ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and TRADE_TYPE in (10, 20, 30, 31, 32, 50, 53, 60)
